A Premier Location for Skeptics of the COVID Responses to Discuss News, Events, Studies, etcetera. 

[Coronavirus Guilds Network](https://ruqqus.com/post/34zk/check-out-our-companion-guilds-in)

Rules: 
* Stay civil and OPs should be Skeptical of the COVID Response
* GuildMasters may kick/ban for any reason they see fit
* This is a SFW guild, Mark NSFW posts
* Report trolls
* Follow ruqqus TOS

Visit the NNN crew at [NoNewNormal.win](https://nonewnormal.win/)

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
The reason it's so high is because they tend to count everything they possibly can as a death for covid. So for example if you're in a car crash and test positive they count that as a covid death. The reason is because they get rewarded for doing so, because there is much money and power to be made off of a fake crisis.

Also not every strand of flu is the same. Some are more mild like a common cold and others hit you pretty hard.
body_html:
The reason it's so high is because they tend to count everything they possibly can as a death for covid. So for example if you're in a car crash and test positive they count that as a covid death. The reason is because they get rewarded for doing so, because there is much money and power to be made off of a fake crisis.

Also not every strand of flu is the same. Some are more mild like a common cold and others hit you pretty hard.

body: Completely agree.  We've also gone through the "dry tinder".  I suspect if We'd update the IFR with just the last 3 months it'd be at flu level.
body_html: Completely agree. We've also gone through the "dry tinder". I suspect if We'd update the IFR with just the last 3 months it'd be at flu level.
